attributes.action:
Ban Loud Fireworks to the Public. 
But Allow Organised and Advertised Displays.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been noted by Animal Charities and  PTSD Charities that the continuous explosives aka fireworks go on for weeks.

This exposure has detrimental effects on Animals and Humans suffering from issues from explosives.
attributes.background: Animals and Sensitive People can have serious issues to loud continuous noises over weeks.
